data.title: Handbjerg Marina
data.text:
Handbjerg Marina is a perfect vacation facility if you are staying in a motorhome. We offer parking that is surrounded by water and an amazing view to both sunrise and sunset.

At the entrance of the marina, you can empty your waste tanks.

Book accommodation now

If you dream of experiencing the Limfjord up close, give your excursion an extra boost with an overnight stay in a Boathouse. Book an overnight stay from home and look forward to going to bed in one of our floating cabins with a panoramic view and a cozy little terrace.

Experiences right outside the door

Boathouses are for everyone who loves outdoor life. That is why we have docked them at Handbjerg Marina, where nature invites you to hike, surf, kayak, cycle or just sit back and enjoy nature.

As a guest in one of our four shelters, you are allowed to experience the Limfjord. There are tables and benches, as well as a fireplace. You must bring firewood yourself. Each shelter has room for 6 people and there is access to toilets in our main building. Bath can be purchased

Below you can book 1-4 shelters. Pay on arrival online at this link.

Included in the price is access to the sailor's lounge and toilets in the service building. Shower bath can be purchased additionally.

Leave the shelters in the same state as before or even better, as if you yourself should visit some other time.
